text: 3:9-10 Matyu 9:21; 14:36; Mak 4:1; Mak 5:29; 6:56; Luk 5:1-3; Luk 7:21Me iraghuezɨma, Iesus gumazamizir avɨribar akurazɨma, men arɨmariaba gɨfa. Arɨmariaba itir gumazamizir avɨriba uan arɨmariaba agɨvasa Iesusɨn boroghɨn uari akuvagha, Iesusɨn suighasa uari munamadi. Kamaghɨn amizɨ, Iesus uan suren gumazibav gɨa ghaze, “Ia botɨn tam inigh izɨ puram anetɨghtɨ a ikɨ. Eghtɨ gumazamiziba bar na akuvaghtɨma kɨ botɨn ghuavanangam.”
